reviews: About delivery and shipping:-I am a non-prime user and I ordered this book on 16th July, 2022. It live in Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, and it arrived in just 5 days, on 21st July, 2022. Books arrived in a sturdy package and has no damages.About book material quality:-The thing I liked the most about this Book is its paper quality, cover quality and pint quality. The paper is so thick that when I turn a page it feels  like I'm turning 2 pages.About  study material quality:-Students who are preparing for CA exams, they know that ICAI modules are essential and enough. But this book is enhanced version of ICAI module. It compresses the ICAI study material from huge scattered data to well arranged and less cluttered information which is easy and swift to understand by students and help in saving some time, which can be reinvested to do multiple revisions.Thank you ANSHUL SIR‚ù§Ô∏è
